parameters: \n<Velona>It would be pretty rude to dream and dash.
Bro, Lune is totally our of your league man.
She is a world-class chef and has got the cute catkin features
You're outta luck if you think she'll got out with a grunt
That small purple catkin girl sure is lucky to have Lune as
She gets to sleep in this cozy inn, AND eat her cooking all the
I wish Lune would adopt me as a sibling.
Ms. Lune always gives out such big portions.
But that means I get to share Lune's amazing cooking with
tepin..? tin pan..? ten pen? Ah whatever it is, the chicken here
Ahh, there's no other place on Tricora with chicken like this.
I wish I could eat and sleep here every night.
Man... I'd go broke if I tried doing that.
\n<Velona>I should just let her sleep for now.
\n<Velona>I don't really want to wet the bed but...
\n<Kishu>VELONA! DID YOU REALLY HAVE TO SPLASH ME AGAIN!?
\n<Velona>I figured you weren't waking up anytime soon, so...
\n<Kishu>I guess it's ok. You did save me again after all.
There was no way I could have beaten Aurora by myself.
\n<Velona>Glad we got that out of the way.
\n<Kishu>Just so you know, I'm fairly confident I can sleep
AND wake up on my own.
So no more water splashes ok?
I haven't been awake more than a day and we've been through so
\n<Velona>Come on, we should go eat something. This place has
got the best grilled chicken in Vysio.
\n<Kishu>That fight with Aurora totally burned me out...
\n<Lune>Nyarcy, watch over them, nap with them, whatever.
Just keep them company. I still have to run the inn.
Well, I'll be at the bar if you need me.
Hope those two wake up soon.
\n<Velona>If Aurora knew we were this exhausted, we'd be
\n<Velona>I wonder where she ran off to...
Shouldn't need to worry about it for now.
\n<Velona>I feel alright. I think I'll walk around and
\n<Velona>This is definitely not who I should be talking to.
You seem to be in good health too.
\n<Lune>I was worried that I might have needed to call a
I just wanted to say thanks for dragging us in here.
\n<Velona>Whatever the fee is for the room, I should have
more than enough to cover it.
\n<Lune>Oh, well that's a bit of relief.
\n<Lune>No need to worry about you two freeloading, haha.
\n<Lune>Well, you two are welcome to stay the rest of the night.
I'll just bill you in the morning.
\n<Velona>While I'm here, could I get some water?
\n<Lune>Gotcha, two mugs of water right at ya.
\n<Lune>No problem. If you need anything else, I'll be right here.
\n<Lune>Ah, looks like you're awake too now.
Glad to see you're both alright.
\n<Lune>Don't mention it. Just providing some good ol'
\n<Lune>So do you two need anything else? You have that room for
Bar is open till 2AM and checkout is at 10AM
\n<Velona>We were wondering if we could get two orders of your
\n<Lune>Hehe, two orders of Lune's Teppanyaki Chicken set
\n<Lune>Just grab whatever open seat, and I'll be with you
\n<Lune>Here it is, two orders of Lune's Teppanyaki Chicken.
\n<Velona>I know right? They don't skimp out on the portions
\n<Kishu>WOW, it tastes as good as it looks!
So tender! And a perfect crispy sear! AMAZING...
\n<Velona>I could honestly go for another but I'll call it
We could both use some proper rest.
\n<Kishu>So... Do you have any special powers besides magic?
\n<Velona>I do have one, but I ain't tellin' you what
\n<Kishu>Awww! That just makes me more curious!
\n<Velona>I'm being straight with you. I can't just reveal
\n<Kishu>Can you at least tell me what it's like to be
\n<Velona>Don't know if you realize this, but I'm pretty sure
This body doesn't feel that different so I guess that
\n<Velona>Time loses value when you can live forever.
\n<Velona>It's kinda sad when you think about it.
\n<Velona>Mortals live to work. To exchange their time and
energy for currency. Spend that currency and repeat that till'
\n<Velona>Us deities however, can work and play as we please.
The concept of "wasting time" is completely foreign to us.
\n<Kishu>Hmm... I wonder how I'll spend my eternity...
\n<Velona>Eh, don't think too hard about it.
\n<Velona>You can literally take as much time as you like.
Heck, you can even decide to do nothing at all and it wouldn't
Aurora screwed up our afternoon and the PEM base probably still
has monsters in it. Good night.
\n<Kishu>Hehe, this reminds of times when I had sleepovers
back when I attended prep school...
